Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

Volt is a highly customizable, minimalistic charging view that displays above your lock screen whenever your device is charging.


• Sleek visuals
• Customize the color/fill of the battery dots
• Dynamic Colors: Automatically changes the dot colors to reflect your battery percentage
• Display a badge when notifications are received
• Display battery percentage when dots are tapped
• Choose either a solid color or a custom image as the background
• Ability to customize the blur of the background
• Option to prevent the lock screen from dimming
• Option to redisplay Volt after screen dim
• Customize various aspects of the time label
• Double tap to dismiss Volt
• Landscape compatibility for supported devices


Configure options from Settings

• Support for iOS 10 • Performance improvements & optimizations • Refactored codebase • Bug fixes - New: Option to change the notification badge size
- New: Flipswitch to quickly enable/disable Volt
- Fixed: Now hides Volt during/while receiving phone calls
- Refactored Preferences backend
- General optimizations
- New: Option to display a badge when notifications are received
- New: Option to display battery percentage when dots are tapped
- New: Option to redisplay Volt after screen dim
- New: Option to toggle padding zero to hour
- New: Option to toggle AM/PM text
- Fixed: Rotation transition is now smoother
- Fixed: Prevents Volt from rotating on unsupported devices
- Fixed: No longer disables screen dim when Volt isn't active
- Performance improvements
